Answer_deepseek-r1: Ushobora gusaba uburenganzira bwo gufasha ukoresheje Irembo ku rubuga: Injira -> Serivisi z'Abafasha -> Kwiyandikisha
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Gufungura amarembo igihe kirekire birashobora gukurura umutekano muke no kwinjira utabifitiye uburenganzira. Ni ngombwa kubahiriza amasaha yakazi kugirango umutekano numutekano wabakozi nabakiriya. Niba ushaka gufasha abantu kubona serivisi zinzira, urashobora kubikora mugihe cyamasaha yagenwe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Tubitangire imbabazi kubera gutinda gutanga uburenganzira. Turimo gukorana umwete kugira ngo twihutishe inzira. Mushobora kureba ku rubuga rwacu cyangwa mugahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha kugira ngo mumenye amakuru agezweho.
Answer_google-translate: Irembo ntabwo yemeye gufungura Irembo kubera umutekano nimpamvu zikorwa. Ariko, urashobora gufasha abantu kubona serivise za Gateway mugutezimbere no gusangira amakuru kubyerekeye serivisi ziboneka binyuze mumiyoboro yemewe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Irembo irimo gukora ku buryo bwo gufungura uburyo bwo gufasha abandi kubona serivisi. Turakumenyesha igihe bizaba bishoboka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Turasaba imbabazi ku kuba byatinze kubera imbogamizi z’ikoreshwa; turakorana ibishoboka byose ngo dutange uburenganzira bwihuse.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Turacyakorera ku buryo bwo gutanga uburenganzira bwo gufasha abandi kubona serivisi z'Irembo. Turabimenyesha vuba uko bizagenda.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri careers.irembo.rw uhitemo akazi ukunda, wandike CV yawe n'inyandiko zose zikenewe
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Kuvugana numuntu ushaka akazi muri irembo, barashobora gusura urubuga rwa irembo cyangwa kuvugana nitsinda ryabakiriya ba irembo bakoresheje terefone cyangwa imeri kugirango bahabwe ubufasha hamwe namahirwe yakazi aboneka kurubuga.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora kureba ku rubuga rwacu rwa Irembo ahandikirwa imyanya y'akazi ishyirwaho, cyangwa ukohereza umwirondoro wawe kuri aderesi yacu y'amakuru rusange.
Answer_google-translate: Kubaza amahirwe yakazi muri Iregate, abantu barashobora gusura urubuga rwa Iregate cyangwa bakabaza ishami ryabo rishinzwe abakozi binyuze kuri imeri cyangwa terefone kugirango bagaragaze ko bashimishijwe kandi babaze imyanya ihari.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ishami ry'abakozi ba Irembo unyuze ku rubuga rwabo cyangwa ukabandikira kuri email yabo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Wakwandikira serivisi z’itangazamakuru za Irembo cyangwa ugakoresha urubuga rwacu kugira ngo ubone amakuru y’akazi.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Umuntu ashaka akazi mu Irembo ashobora kohereza CV ye kuri email yacu careers@irembo.rw cyangwa akajya ku rubuga rwacu agakurikiza amabwiriza yo gusaba akazi.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Koresha code ya QR iri ku cyangombwa cyawe kuri Irembo, uhitemo 'Kwishyura Umusoro' ukurikize amabwiriza
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba waratakaje impapurompamo z'ubutaka bwawe ukaba ukeneye kwishyura umusoro w'ubutaka mu rwanda, ushobora gusaba impapurompamo z'ubutaka z'inyigana binyuze mu biro bishinzwe kwandika ubutaka. Umaze kugira impapuro zingana, urashobora gukomeza kwishyura umusoro w'ubutaka ku biro by'ikigo cy'imisoro n'amahoro (rra) cyangwa kumurongo ukoresheje urubuga rwabo.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Kugira ngo ubone icyangombwa cy'ubutaka bundi bushya, wagana ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka cyangwa ukoreshe urubuga rwa Irembo (irembo.gov.rw) usaba kopi yacyo. Uzakenera gutanga ibisobanuro by'ubutaka bwawe.
Answer_google-translate: Niba waratakaje ubutaka bwawe mu Rwanda, uzakenera gusaba titre ebyiri kubiro bishinzwe iyandikisha ry'ubutaka. Umaze kugira titre duplicate, urashobora gukomeza kwishyura imisoro yubutaka nkuko leta ibisabwa.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo gishya cy'ubutaka unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka by'akarere.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba icyemezo gishyashya cy’ubutaka mu biro byacu cyangwa ukoreshe serivisi zacu kuri Irembo zifasha kuvugurura inyandiko.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba kopi y'icyangombwa cy'ubutaka mu biro by'ubutaka byo mu karere kawe. Uzakenera kwerekana indangamuntu yawe n'inyemezabwishyu y'amafaranga asabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Pasiporo zishobora gutwara iminsi 3-5 nyuma y'uko ibisabwa byuzuye. Reba status yawe kuri Irembo buri munsi
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Yego, nshobora kugufasha gusaba pasiporo binyuze muri serivisi za irembo mu rwanda. Urashobora gusura urubuga rwa irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa kugirango utangire gahunda yawe yo gusaba kumurongo.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Birashoboka ko hari ikibazo cya tekiniki. Gerageza kongera cyangwa uhamagare umurongo wacu w'ubufasha kuri [Nimero ya telefone y'Irembo] kugira ngo bagufashe mu gusaba pasiporo.
Answer_google-translate: Nibyo, ndashobora kugufasha gusaba pasiporo binyuze muri serivisi za Irembo mu Rwanda. Nyamuneka mpa amakuru akenewe hamwe ninyandiko, kandi nzakuyobora muburyo bwo gusaba.
Answer_gpt-4o: Turashishikariza gukomeza kugerageza cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'abinjira n'abasohoka kugira ngo bagufashe.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Twandikire kuri serivisi za Irembo maze tukuyobore mu buryo bwo gusaba pasiporo.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ntibishoboka ko tukwiyandikishiriza pasiporo. Ariko ushobora gusaba ubufasha bwo kuzuza neza inyandiko za ngombwa. Nyamuneka, gerageza kongera cyangwa utugane ku biro byacu.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Koresha serivisi ya 'Code Recovery' kuri Irembo, ukazana indangamuntu yemewe nka kopi y'irangamimerere.
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Oya, irembo si irembo. Irembo ni urubuga rwa interineti mu rwanda rutanga serivisi za leta ku baturage n'ubucuruzi.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Hari igihe code ishobora gutinda kubera impamvu za tekiniki cyangwa verifikasiyo. Ushobora kureba kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukavugisha serivisi z'abakiriya kugira ngo bakurikirane ikibazo cyawe.
Answer_google-translate: Oya, Irembo ntabwo ari irembo. Irembo ni urubuga rwa interineti mu Rwanda rutanga serivisi za leta kubaturage nubucuruzi.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona iyo code.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Icyo kibazo gikunze guterwa n’ikibazo mu kugenzura amakuru; nyamuneka vugana n’abashinzwe gufasha abakiriya kugira ngo bakurikirane ikibazo cyawe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Iyo utaboye code nyuma yo kwiyandikisha, ushobora guhamagara umurongo wacu w'ubufasha kuri 9099 cyangwa ukandika ubutumwa kuri support@irembo.rw tukagufasha kubona code yawe.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Koresha SMS service wo gukora ubusabe bwa SMS ukoresheje *909# kuri telefoni yawe.
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Urashobora kugarura ubutumwa bwabuze winjiye muri konte yawe ya irembo hanyuma ukagera kumateka yubutumwa. Jya gusa kumutwe wubutumwa kurubuga kugirango usubiremo amakuru yose yingenzi ushobora kuba warabuze.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusaba ko bakongera kukohereza ubutumwa ukoresheje konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wabo. Tegura nimero yawe y'irangamuntu cyangwa dosiye.
Answer_google-translate: Urashobora kubona ubutumwa winjiye muri konte yawe ya Irembo ukareba amateka yubutumwa bwawe. Niba udashoboye kuyimenya, urashobora kwegera abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe mugutanga ubutumwa mbere yikizamini cyawe ejo.
Answer_gpt-4o: Gerageza kongera kugerageza cyangwa uvugane n'abakozi ba Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba ubutumwa bwo kwibutsa mu buryo bwihuse hifashishijwe serivisi zacu za Irembo.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kongera kwinjira ku konti yawe ya Irembo ukareba ubutumwa bwose, cyangwa ukaduhamagara kuri 9099 tukagufasha kubona ubutumwa bwabuze.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Italiki zose zerekana kuri konti yawe ya Irembo. Kanda 'Exam Schedule' muri menu y'ibikorwa.
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Kugirango ubone itariki yikizamini cyawe, urashobora kwinjira kuri konte yawe ya irembo aho wiyandikishije mukizamini. Umaze kwinjira, ugomba gushobora kureba itariki yikizamini cyawe mumwirondoro wawe cyangwa ibice biri imbere.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora kureba itariki y'ikizamini cyawe winjiye kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ahanditse 'Ibyo nasabye', cyangwa ugahamagara umurongo wabo w'ubufasha kuri [Nimero ya telefone y'Irembo].
Answer_google-translate: Kugirango ugarure itariki yawe y'ibizamini, urashobora kwinjira kuri konte yawe ya Irembo hanyuma ukareba gahunda uzaza cyangwa ukabaza akanama gashinzwe ibizamini kugirango ubafashe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kwinjira mu rubuga rwa Irembo ukareba italiki y'ikizamini cyawe cyangwa ukabaza abakozi ba Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Kanda ku rubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa uhamagare serivisi zacu kugira ngo ubone amakuru y’itariki y’ikizamini.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kwinjira ku konti yawe ya Irembo ukareba amakuru y'ikizamini cyawe. Niba ukomeza kugira ibibazo, duhamagare kuri 9099 tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Twakiriye ubusabe bwawe. Turabagerageza guhera mu masaha 24 ataha. Mwongere mugerageze nyuma y'igice cy'isaha.
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba wiyandikishije kuri serivisi hamwe na irembo mwijoro ryakeye ukaba ukeneye kwishyura, urashobora kubikora byoroshye ukoresheje uburyo bwo kwishyura. Ubushake bwawe bwo gufasha burashimwa, kandi urashobora kugera kubufasha bwabakiriya kubufasha ubwo aribwo bwose ushobora gukenera.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Bishobora guterwa n'ikibazo cy'igihe gito muri sisitemu yo kwishyura. Gerageza kongera nyuma gato cyangwa ukoreshe ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura bushoboka. Niba bikomeje, hamagara ubufasha bw'abakiriya.
Answer_google-translate: Niba wiyandikishije mwijoro ryakeye kandi ukaba ugifite ibibazo byo kwishyura, nyamuneka wegera abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe. Bazashobora kugufasha gukemura ibibazo byose bijyanye no kwishura no kwemeza inzira nziza kuri wewe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Gerageza kongera kugerageza cyangwa uvugane n'abakozi ba Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Tegereza gato cyangwa uhamagare serivisi zacu kugira ngo utange ikibazo cyawe ku bijyanye no kwishyura neza.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kugerageza ubundi buryo bwo kwishyura nk'ikofi, MTN Mobile Money cyangwa ukoresha banki. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, duhamagare kuri 9099 tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Numero ya dosiye irasanga kuri email yawe yakiriye ubusabe. Turabifashisha niba utabibona.
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Mumbabarire, ariko sinshobora gutanga nimero yihariye ya dosiye.  Ariko, urashobora kuvugana ibiro cyangwa ishami bireba aho watanze icyifuzo cyawe kugirango ugarure numero ya dosiye.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusanga numero ya dosiye yawe muri SMS cyangwa email wakiriye nyuma yo gusaba. Niba utayibona, hamagara serivisi z'abakiriya za Irembo ufite amakuru yawe bwite, baragufasha.
Answer_google-translate: Kubwamahirwe, nkumufasha, ntabwo nshobora kubona amakuru yihariye nka numero ya dosiye yawe. Ndasaba kuvugana ninzego zibishinzwe cyangwa itsinda rya serivisi ryabakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe kugarura numero yawe ya dosiye kugirango usabe indangamuntu.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona iyo numero ya dosiye.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka reba mu nyandiko zawe cyangwa uhamagare serivisi z’abakiriya za Irembo kugira ngo ubone numero ya dosiye yawe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kwinjira ku konti yawe ya Irembo ukareba amakuru y'ubusabe bwawe. Cyangwa udutumire kuri 9099 tukagufasha kubona numero ya dosiye yawe.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Koresha serivisi ya Document Download kuri Irembo -> Amavuko -> Shyiramo numero y'irangamimerere -> Kanda 'Download PDF'
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba ugerageza kwigana icyemezo cy'amavuko cyawe ariko ufite ibibazo, ni byiza ko wasura ikigo cya serivise z'irembo kiri hafi kugirango ugihe ubufasha. Barashobora kugufasha kumenya ikibazo no gutanga inama zuburyo bwo gukomeza kubona kopi yinyandiko yawe y'amavuko.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Gerageza gukoresha indi internet browser cyangwa uhanagure cache ya browser yawe. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, bishobora kuba ari ikibazo cya seriveri. Ongera ugerageze nyuma gato cyangwa uvugishe ubufasha bwa Irembo.
Answer_google-translate: Niba uhuye nibibazo byo gukuramo icyemezo cyamavuko kuri Irembo, nyamuneka urebe ko ufite umurongo wa interineti uhamye kandi ugerageze kuvugurura page cyangwa gukuraho cache ya mushakisha yawe. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, urashobora guhamagara abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Gerageza kongera kugerageza cyangwa uvugane n'abakozi ba Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Icyo kibazo gishobora guterwa n’imikorere ya sisitemu; vugana n’itsinda rishinzwe ikoranabuhanga kuri Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Gerageza gusiba cache y'urubuga cyangwa ukoresha browser itandukanye. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, duhamagare kuri 9099 tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Tumizera email ku support@irembo.rw ugaragaza 'Update Application Location' mu mutwe, uzuzemo ibisobanuro byawe
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Serivisi za irembo ntizitanga ubufasha bwo gukuramo dosiye cyangwa kwiyandikisha ahantu runaka. Nyamuneka hamagara umuryango cyangwa ikigo gikwiye kugirango ukemure icyifuzo cyawe cyihariye cyo gukorera musanze aho kuba rusizi.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Niba application yawe itaremezwa burundu, ushobora kuyihagarika kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ukongera ugasaba. Niba yamaze kwemezwa, hamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo bakuyobore ku buryo bwo guhindura aho uzakorerara ikizamini.
Answer_google-translate: Kugira ngo ukosore amakosa mu kwiyandikisha kwawe, nyamuneka hamagara abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bakureho dosiye itari yo. Iyo dosiye imaze gukurwaho, urashobora gukomeza kwiyandikisha hamwe nuburyo bukwiye bwa Musanze.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba guhindura aho uzakorera unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Twandikire hakiri kare maze tugufashe gukosora amakuru ya serivisi wahisemo, tukaguhindurira dosiye yawe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ntibishoboka gusiba dosiye imaze kwandikwa. Ariko ushobora gusaba kuyihindura. Duhamagare kuri 9099 cyangwa wandike kuri support@irembo.rw tukakuyobora.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Twakiriye ubusabe. Turabagerageza gukora modification mu masaha 48. Reba status kuri Irembo -> My Applications -> Marriage
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Mbabarira, ariko serivisi z'irembo nta bubasha zifite bwo guhindura uwo ugiye kurongora. Ibyemezo byo gushyingirwa ni ibyawe bwite kandi bigomba kuganirwaho hagati yawe numukunzi wawe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Impinduka nk'izo zisaba ko ubanza guhagarika ubusabe bwambere ukabona gutanga ubundi bushya. Gana umurenge wandikishirijemo cyangwa ubavugishe unyuze kuri Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubikora mu buryo bukurikije amategeko.
Answer_google-translate: Ubukwe bumaze kwandikwa mu Rwanda, ntibishoboka guhindura umukunzi wawe ugashyiraho undi. Niba umukunzi wawe yanze kwandikisha abashakanye, ushobora gukenera kugisha inama amategeko muburyo bwo gukomeza.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba guhindura amakuru y'ubukwe unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba impinduka ku makuru yawe anyuze mu bigo bishinzwe imicungire y’amadosiye kuri Irembo, kandi bizakurikiranwa mu buryo bwemewe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba guhindura amakuru y'ubukwe bwawe. Nyamuneka, duhamagare kuri 9099 cyangwa wandike kuri support@irembo.rw tukakuyobora mu nzira zo gukora izo mpinduka.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kwishyura mbere y'igihe: Injira kuri Irembo -> Taxes -> Early Payment -> Shyiramo code y'umusoro wawe
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Ushobora kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare ukoresheje urubuga rwa interineti rw'ikigo cy'imisoro n'amahoro kuri irembo. Sura urubuga hanyuma ukurikire amabwiriza yo kwishyura mbere yigihe ntarengwa.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora kwishyura imisoro y'ubutaka ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukoresheje mobile money (MoMo Pay) ukurikiza amabwiriza yatanzwe na RRA (Ikigo cy'Imisoro n'Amahoro).
Answer_google-translate: Urashobora kuriha imisoro kumurongo ukoresheje urubuga rwu Rwanda Revenue Authority (RRA) ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo. Sura gusa urubuga rwa RRA, hitamo uburyo bwo kwishyura imisoro, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare kandi wirinde ibihano byose.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gukoresha serivisi za Irembo kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Hamagara serivisi z’inyungu z’ubutaka cyangwa ukoreshe urubuga rwa Irembo kugira ngo ushobore kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kwishyura imisoro yawe ukoresheje Irembo. Injira ku rubuga rwacu, ukore konti, uhitemo serivisi yo kwishyura imisoro, ukurikize amabwiriza.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> ID Services -> Photo Update -> Shyiramo numero y'ID -> Tungura ifoto yawe (35x45mm)
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Yego, irembo itanga serivise yo gusimbuza amafoto y'indangamuntu mu rwanda. Urashobora gusaba byoroshye gusimbuza ukoresheje urubuga rwa irembo hanyuma ugakurikiza intambwe zikenewe kugirango ubone idosiye yawe nshya.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Gusimbuza ifoto ku ndangamuntu bisaba ko usaba indangamuntu nshya. Gana ku rubuga rwa Irembo, hitamo serivisi yo gusaba indangamuntu, maze ukurikize amabwiriza, harimo no kohereza ifoto nshya ikurikije ibisabwa.
Answer_google-translate: Nibyo, Irembo itanga serivise ifasha abantu gusimbuza amafoto kurirangamuntu yabo mu Rwanda. Urashobora gukoresha urubuga rwa Irembo kugirango utangire inzira kandi ukurikize intambwe zikenewe zo kuvugurura ifoto yindangamuntu.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusimbuza amafoto yo ku ndangamuntu unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Tegereza ibisabwa byuzuye by’amafoto, hanyuma usabe gusimbuza amafoto anyuze mu nzira yemewe kuri Irembo.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Kugira ngo usimbuze ifoto y'indangamuntu, uzakenera kuzana ifoto nshya, indangamuntu yawe y'ubu, no kwishyura amafaranga asabwa. Ushobora gusaba iyi serivisi ku rubuga rwacu.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Imyanya iriho bigeze ku bisabwa by'akarere. Kanda kuri Irembo -> Permits -> District Requirements -> Busanza
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Mu kwiyandikisha ku rubuga rwa irembo, urashobora kubona serivisi zitandukanye zitangwa na leta yu rwanda kumurongo. Ibi birimo gusaba no kuvugurura impushya nkibiciro byumushoferi, iyandikisha ryimodoka, hamwe nimpushya zubucuruzi byoroshye kuri mudasobwa yawe cyangwa igikoresho kigendanwa.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Imyanya yo gukorera ibizamini bya permit ishyirwaho hashingiwe ku mashuri yigisha gutwara ibinyabiziga n'ahantu hakorerwa ibizamini. Imyanya ishobora kuba ari mike cyangwa yaruzuye ahandi. Gerageza kureba kenshi cyangwa uhamagare Polisi ishami rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda.
Answer_google-translate: Mugihe wiyandikishije kugirango ubone uruhushya binyuze muri serivisi za Irembo mu Rwanda, urashobora gusaba byoroshye no gucunga ibyemezo bya leta bitandukanye kumurongo, bikagutwara igihe n'imbaraga.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona imyanya ahandi.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Icyo kibazo gishobora guterwa n’amakuru atuzuye; saba guhindura ibipimo byawe kuri Irembo binyuze mu murongo w’ubufasha.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Imyanya igaragara biterwa n'aho amasaha ari menshi. Ushobora gukomeza kugenzura buri gihe kuko imyanya mishya yongerwa buri munsi. Cyangwa udutumire tukagufasha kubona ikindi gihe.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Tumizera kopi y'ishyurahamwe ryanyu rimwe kuri refunds@irembo.rw hamwe n'ibisobanuro by'ingaruka
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba warishyuye amahazabu yo mumuhanda ariko nyuma ukavumbura ko umushoferi wawe nayo yishyuye, urashobora kuvugana n'inzego zibishinzwe kugirango usabe gusubizwa amafaranga yishyura. Ubahe gihamya ikenewe yo kwishyura kugirango byorohereze inzira.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Niba habayeho kwishyura inshuro ebyiri ihazabu y'umuhanda, mutwandikire mufite ibimenyetso by'ubwishyu (receipts) zombi. Tuzagenzura ikibazo cyanyu kandi tubafashe mu nzira yo gusaba gusubizwa amafaranga y'inyongera.
Answer_google-translate: Niba wishyuye amande yimodoka ariko umushoferi wawe nawe yarayishyuye, ugomba guhamagara inzego zibishinzwe kugirango ubamenyeshe ubwishyu bubiri. Tanga icyemezo cyuko wishyuye kandi usabe gusubizwa ubwishyu bubiri bwakozwe numushoferi wawe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona ayo mafaranga.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Hamagara serivisi zacu z’abakiriya kugira ngo hagaragazwe uburyo bwo gusubizwa amafaranga igihe byagaragaye ko habayeho kwishyura inshuro ebyiri.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba gusubizwa amafaranga wakoresheje ubwa kabiri. Uzakenera kwerekana inyemezabwishyu zombi. Duhamagare kuri 9099 cyangwa wandike kuri support@irembo.rw tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Koresha serivisi ya Status Check: Injira kuri Irembo -> My Applications -> Case Status -> Shyiramo reference number yawe
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Irembo itanga serivisi aho abayikoresha bashobora gusaba icyemezo cy'ubutabera.  Ushobora kubona iki cyemezo ako kanya nyuma yo kohereza icyifuzo cyawe kumurongo ukoresheje urubuga rwa irembo.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Igihe gisabwa gishobora guhinduka bitewe n'umubare w'abasaba cyangwa igenzura rikenewe. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo ubaze.
Answer_google-translate: Irembo itanga serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cyinshinjabyaha, ushobora kuboneka vuba kandi byoroshye kumurongo. Urashobora gutanga icyifuzo cyawe ukoresheje Irembo hanyuma ukakira icyemezo vuba.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona icyo cyemezo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Turasaba imbabazi ku myandikire yabayeho; nyamuneka saba gukurikirana aho icyemezo kiri cyagaragaza impamvu cyatinze.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Igihe cyo gutanga icyemezo gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'umubare w'abasaba. Ushobora kugenzura aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze ku rubuga rwacu. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, duhamagare kuri 9099.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Tumizera email ku legal@irembo.rw ugaragaza 'Family Exemption Clarification' mu mutwe, uzuzemo kopi y'icyemezo
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Ndasaba kwegera ubuyobozi butanga cyangwa ishami bireba kugirango ubaze kubyerekeye gutinda guhabwa icyemezo cyo kurekura umugore wawe, umuhungu wawe, nawe ubwawe. Bagomba kuba bashobora kuguha amakuru mashya no gusobanura impamvu yatinze.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Hari igihe igenzura ku muntu umwe ritwara igihe kirenze icy'abandi bitewe n'amakuru agomba kubanza kugenzurwa. Ushobora gukurikirana ubusabe bwawe kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.
Answer_google-translate: Ndasaba kwegera ubuyobozi butanga kugirango mubaze ibijyanye no gutinda kubona ibyemezo bivuga ko wowe, umugore wawe, numuhungu wawe utafunzwe. Bashobora gutanga ibisobanuro kubibazo kandi bagafasha gukemura ibibazo byose.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo kugira ngo bagufashe kubona ibyo byemezo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Reba uburyo ubusabe bwanyu bwakiriwe cyangwa uzahamagare serivisi z'abakiriya za Irembo kugira ngo bagenzure impamvu byatinze.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Buri busabe bugenzurwa ukwabwo. Ushobora kugenzura aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze ku rubuga rwacu. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, duhamagare kuri 9099 tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> Land Services -> Document Tracking -> Shyiramo numero y'irangamimerere -> Reba progress
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba wahinduye impapuro mpamo z'ubutaka bwawe ukwezi gushize ukaba utarabona impapuro mpamo zivuguruye, ushobora kugenzura imiterere y'impapuro mpamo z'ubutaka bwawe ku biro by'ikigo gishinzwe imicungire n'imikoreshereze y'ubutaka mu rwanda (rlmua) aho byakorewe. Bazashobora kuguha amakuru ku miterere y'inyito yawe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo ukoresheje numero ya dosiye wahawe. Niba utayibona, hamagara serivisi z'abakiriya ba Irembo cyangwa uwegere ikigo gishinzwe ubutaka.
Answer_google-translate: Kugirango umenye uko icyemezo cyubutaka bwawe gihagaze nyuma ya mutation, urashobora gusura ibiro byubuyobozi bushinzwe imicungire yubutaka n’imikoreshereze (RLMUA) aho mutation yatunganyirijwe. Bazashobora kuguha amakuru agezweho kubijyanye no gutanga ibyemezo byawe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kuvugana n'ubuyobozi bwa Irembo cyangwa ibiro by'ubutaka kugira ngo bamenye aho icyangombwa cyawe kigeze.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Saba amakuru y'aho icyangombwa kiri anyuze mu murongo w'ubufasha kuri Irembo, maze usuzume uko byagenze mu buryo bw'umwuga.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora kugenzura aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze ukoresheje numero ya dosiye yawe ku rubuga rwacu. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, duhamagare kuri 9099 tukagufasha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Amanota ashyirwa kuri konti yawe mu masaha 48. Kanda kuri Irembo -> Exams -> Results -> Shyiramo code y'ikizamini
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba wasohotse mu kizamini utareba amanota yawe, urashobora gukenera kuvugana numuyobozi wikizamini cyangwa ikigo kugirango ubaze kubyerekeye kubona ibisubizo byawe. Bagomba kuba bashobora kugufasha kugarura amanota yawe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Amanota y'ibizamini bya permit ubusanzwe yoherezwa kuri telefone wandikishije cyangwa kuri email. Niba utayabonye, injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa uhamagare umurongo w'ubufasha kugira ngo barebe uko byagenze.
Answer_google-translate: Niba wavuye mu kizamini utarebye amanota yawe, urashobora guhamagara umuyobozi w'ikigo cyangwa ikigo kugirango usabe amanota yawe. Bashobora kuguha amakuru ukeneye.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kwinjira mu rubuga rwa Irembo ukareba amanota yawe cyangwa ukabaza abakozi ba Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Tegereza gato cyangwa uhamagare serivisi zacu kugira ngo ubone amakuru ajyanye n'amanota yawe byihuse.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Amanota yawe abikwa mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga. Ushobora kwinjira ku konti yawe ya Irembo ukareba amanota yawe. Niba ukomeza kugira ibibazo, duhamagare kuri 9099.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Ibyemezo bisabwa mu gihe cyo gukora mutation, gushyingira, cyangwa gukemura ibibazo by'ubutaka. Reba kuri Irembo -> Legal Certificates
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Icyemezo cyo kubaho gikunze gusabwa kubwimpamvu zemewe cyangwa zubuyobozi kugirango werekane ko umuntu cyangwa ikigo kibaho. Ntabwo byanze bikunze byemeza niba umuntu ari muzima cyangwa atari muzima; ikora gusa nkibisobanuro byubuzima bwabo nkuko byemewe nubuyobozi butanga.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Icyemezo cy'uko uriho kiba gikenewe n'inzego zimwe na zimwe (nka banki, ubwishingizi, n'ibindi) kugira ngo zemeze ko umuntu akiriho, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n'imicungire y'umutungo cyangwa ubwiteganyirize. Ni inyandiko yemewe n'amategeko.
Answer_google-translate: Icyemezo kibaho, nk'icyemezo cy'amavuko cyangwa inyandiko iranga, akenshi bisabwa mubikorwa bitandukanye, harimo kubona serivisi za leta, gufungura konti muri banki, no gusaba ibyangombwa. Ifasha kumenya umwirondoro wumuntu no kwemererwa uburenganzira ninyungu runaka.
Answer_gpt-4o: Icyemezo cy'uko umuntu ari ho gishobora gusabwa mu gihe cyo gukemura ibibazo by'ubuzima cyangwa ibindi bibazo byihariye.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Icyemezo cy'aho uba gitangwa kugira ngo cyemezwe ko amakuru yawe ari ukuri; nyamuneka saba gusobanukirwa neza iby'icyemezo mu buryo bw'akazi.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Icyemezo cy'uko umuntu ari ho gisabwa mu bikorwa bimwe na bimwe by'amategeko nk'izungura, cyangwa ibikorwa bya banki. Ni ngombwa kugira ngo hatagira uwiyitirira undi.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kwiyandikisha nk'umufasha: Injira kuri Irembo -> Abafasha -> Application -> Uzuze fomu y'ubufasha ukurikiza amabwiriza
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Irembo itanga urubuga rworoshye kumurongo aho ushobora kubona serivisi zitandukanye za leta, harimo na serivisi zirishya, udakeneye ubufasha bwumubiri. Sura gusa urubuga rwa irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa kugirango ubone serivisi ukeneye.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Kugira ngo ube umu agent wa Irembo ugomba kubanza kubisaba. Gana ku rubuga rwa Irembo ushake amakuru ajyanye no kuba umu agent cyangwa uhamagare serivisi z'abakiriya babo bakuyobore ku bisabwa n'inzira zikurikizwa.
Answer_google-translate: Serivisi za Irembo zitanga urubuga rworoshye rwo kugera kuri serivisi zitandukanye za leta kumurongo mu Rwanda. Urashobora kubona byoroshye no gukoresha izi serivisi ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa, byorohereza abantu bo mu turere twa kure kubona serivisi zingenzi badakeneye ubufasha bwumubiri.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba guhabwa uburenganzira bwo gufasha abandi kubona serivisi za Irembo unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Wakoresha uburyo bwo kwiyandikisha ugahabwa konti yihariye, kandi ushobora kugisha inama serivisi zacu z'ikoranabuhanga kuri Irembo.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba kuba umufasha wa Irembo ukandikira kuri agents@irembo.rw. Tuzakoherereza amakuru ajyanye n'ibisabwa n'uburyo bwo kwiyandikisha.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Tunganya ifoto yawe: 35x45mm, umweru, PDF/JPG. Koresha Irembo Photo Checker mbere yo gusubiza
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Kuri irembo, turagutera inkunga yo gusaba ubufasha ku irembo kugirango wizere neza kandi neza serivisi. Ikipe yacu iri hano kugirango igufashe mubibazo byose cyangwa ubufasha ushobora gukenera mugihe cyo gusura.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Menya neza ko ifoto ushyiraho yujuje ibisabwa byose bijyanye n'ingano (size) na format. Irembo isobanura neza ibipimo by'ifoto yemewe ku rubuga rwayo. Gerageza kugabanya ubunini bwayo ukoresheje software cyangwa application ibikora.
Answer_google-translate: Nkuko tubashishikarije gusaba serivisi kumarembo, nyamuneka menye neza ko ufite ibyangombwa byose nibisobanuro byateguwe mbere kugirango byihute. Byongeye kandi, wumve neza ko wegera itsinda ryacu ryunganira abakiriya niba uhuye nikibazo cyangwa ufite ikibazo mugihe cyo gusaba.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora kugabanya ingano y'ifoto cyangwa ukayihindura mu buryo bwemewe kugira ngo ibashe kwakirwa.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Reba amabwiriza yifoto isabwa kuri Irembo, ushyireho ifoto mu bipimo byemewe maze usabe kongera gutunganya ubusabe bwawe.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ifoto yawe igomba kuba ifite ingano itarenze 2MB kandi iri mu buryo bwa JPG cyangwa PNG. Ushobora kuyigabanya ukoresheje porogaramu zo kugabanya amashusho mbere yo kongera kuyigerageza.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Ibyo bisabwa mu gihe cyo gushyingira cyangwa gukemura ibibazo by'ubutaka. Reba kuri Irembo -> Legal -> Special Certificates
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Mu rwanda, abantu bashobora gusaba icyemezo cy'ubusugi kugira ngo batangaze ku mugaragaro ko batarubatse cyangwa mu bumwe bw'abaturage. Ibisabwa ngo uzane icyemezo cy'uko ari ingaragu kivuye mu mudugudu bifasha mu kugenzura imiterere y'usaba no kureba ko amakuru yatanzwe ari ukuri.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Icyemezo cy'ubuseribateri gitangwa n'ubuyobozi bw'ibanze (Umudugudu/Akagari) kugira ngo cyemeze ko koko utarashaka. Irembo ifasha mu gusaba icyo cyemezo ariko kigomba kuba gishingiye ku makuru atangwa n'ubuyobozi bukwegereye.
Answer_google-translate: Iyo umuntu asabye icyemezo cy'ubuseribateri mu Rwanda, asabwa kuzana icyemezo mu mudugudu wabo kugira ngo agenzure uko abashakanye bahagaze. Iyi nyandiko yinyongera ifasha kwemeza ukuri nukuri kwamakuru yatanzwe mugikorwa cyo gusaba.
Answer_gpt-4o: Icyemezo kerekana ko umuntu ari ingaragu gishobora gusabwa mu gihe cyo gushyingirwa cyangwa mu bindi bikorwa byihariye.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Icyo kibazo giterwa n'uburyo bwo kugenzura aho umuntu aturuka; nyamuneka saba ibisobanuro byimbitse kugira ngo wumve neza ibisabwa.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Icyemezo cy'umudugudu ni kimwe mu byangombwa ngombwa bisabwa kugira ngo hakorwe isuzuma ryuzuye mbere yo gutanga icyemezo cy'uko umuntu ari ingaragu.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Pasiporo zishobora gutwara iminsi 5-7. Kanda kuri Irembo -> Passport Tracking -> Shyiramo application number
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba pasiporo yawe itinze, birashobora gufata ibyumweru 2-4 kugirango igere. Ushobora kugenzura imiterere y'ubusabe bwa pasiporo yawe kurubuga rwa irembo kugirango ubone amakuru ku gihe cyo gutanga.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Igihe cyo kubona pasiporo gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'ubwoko bwa pasiporo wasabye n'umubare w'abandi basaba. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukabaza ku biro by'abinjira n'abasohoka.
Answer_google-translate: Igihe cyo gutunganya pasiporo mu Rwanda ni iminsi 10 y'akazi. Niba pasiporo yawe ifata igihe kirenze ibi, urashobora kugenzura ninzego zibishinzwe kugirango ubaze uko ibyifuzo byawe bihagaze.
Answer_gpt-4o: Pasiporo isanzwe itwara igihe gito mu gihe ibisabwa byose byubahirijwe, ariko igihe kirashobora kwiyongera bitewe n'impamvu zitandukanye.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Pasiporo isaba igihe gito kijyanye n'ubushobozi bwa sisitemu; ushobora kubaza serivisi zacu kugira ngo umenye igihe nyacyo bizatwara.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Pasiporo isanzwe itwara iminsi 5-7 y'akazi. Ariko igihe gishobora kuba kirekire bitewe n'umubare w'abasaba. Ushobora kugenzura aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze ku rubuga rwacu.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Turahuza diplome: Injira kuri Irembo -> Education -> Diploma Verification -> Shyiramo ibisabwa byose
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Yego, kuri irembo urashobora gusaba kwemeza impamyabumenyi yawe yamahanga kugirango yemerwe mu rwanda. Uzakenera gutanga ibyangombwa bikenewe kandi ukurikire inzira yagaragajwe kurubuga rwa irembo kugirango impamyabumenyi yawe isuzumwe kandi yemererwe gukoreshwa mu rwanda.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Yego, Irembo itanga serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cy'ihwanya (equivalence) rya diplome zo mu mahanga. Injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, ushake iyo serivisi, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo gusaba, harimo no gutanga inyandiko zisabwa.
Answer_google-translate: Nibyo, kuri Irembo urashobora gusaba kuringaniza dipolome yawe yamahanga kugirango yemeze mu Rwanda. Uzakenera gutanga ibyangombwa bikenewe hanyuma ukurikize inzira yo gusaba kugirango ubone uburinganire.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba guhabwa diplome ifite agaciro ko mu Rwanda unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Saba gahunda zacu zunganira aho usaba diplome, maze ubone ubufasha mu buryo bwemewe kandi bwihuse bwa Irembo.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Kugira ngo diplome yawe yo mu mahanga yemerwe mu Rwanda, ugomba gusaba icyemezo cy'iyemerwa mu Kigo cy'Igihugu Gishinzwe Uburezi (REB). Ushobora gutangira ukoresheje Irembo.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Ibyemezo bisabwa mu gihe cyo gukora mutation, gushyingira, cyangwa gukemura ibibazo by'ubutaka. Reba kuri Irembo -> Legal Certificates
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Kugirango ubone icyemezo cy'umushinjacyaha mu rwanda, ushobora kubisaba ukoresheje urubuga rwa irembo. Sura gusa urubuga rwa irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa, hitamo serivisi bireba, wuzuze amakuru asabwa, hanyuma ukurikire amabwiriza yo kurangiza inzira yo gusaba.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha gitangwa na RIB (Ikigo gishinzwe Ubufatanye n'Ukuri) kugira ngo cyemeze ko umuntu akiriho atakiriye inyandiko z'ubushinjacyaha. Ushobora gusaba icyo cyemezo kuri urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RIB.
Answer_google-translate: Kugira ngo umuntu abone icyemezo cy'umushinjacyaha mu Rwanda, umuntu ku giti cye ashobora gusura ibiro by'ubushinjacyaha bikwegereye cyangwa akabaza ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubushinjacyaha (NPPA) kugira ngo akuyobore ku bisabwa byihariye n'uburyo agomba gukurikiza. Ni ngombwa gutanga ibyangombwa byose bikenewe hamwe namakuru kugirango ashyigikire icyifuzo cyumushinjacyaha.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubushinjacyaha.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba icyemezo gishyashya cy’ubutaka mu biro byacu cyangwa ukoreshe serivisi zacu kuri Irembo zifasha kuvugurura inyandiko.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha ukoresheje Irembo. Injira ku rubuga rwacu, ukore konti, uhitemo iyo serivisi, wuzuze amakuru asabwa, wishyure amafaranga asabwa, hanyuma utegereze icyemezo cyawe.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Tumizera email ku legal@irembo.rw ugaragaza 'Birth Certificate Clarification' mu mutwe, uzuzemo kopi y'icyemezo
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Birakomeye! Niba umaze kubona icyemezo cyawe cyamavuko, ugomba kuba witeguye inzira yo gusaba akazi muri rba. Witondere gutanga ibyangombwa bisabwa kandi ukurikize amabwiriza yinyongera atangwa numukoresha. Amahirwe masa kubisaba akazi!
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Acte de naissance ni icyemezo cy'ubwana cyatanzwe n'ababyeyi cyangwa abazungu ba muntu wese. Irembo ifasha mu gusaba icyemezo cy'amavuko, ariko kigomba kuba gishingiye ku makuru atangwa n'ababyeyi cyangwa abazungu. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.
Answer_google-translate: Niba warabonye icyemezo cyamavuko, urashobora gukoresha serivise ya Irembo kugirango ubone icyemezo cyangwa usabe izindi kopi mugihe bikenewe kugirango usabe akazi muri RBA.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'amavuko gishya unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Tegereza gato cyangwa uhamagare serivisi zacu kugira ngo utange ikibazo cyawe ku bijyanye no kwishyura neza.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Acte de naissance n'icyemezo cy'amavuko ni ibintu bibiri bitandukanye. Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'amavuko gishya ukoresheje Irembo kugira ngo kibe cyujuje ibisabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> Permits -> Vehicle Registration -> Shyiramo ibisabwa byose
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Niba ufite uruhushya rwo gutwara, urashobora gukoresha urubuga rwa interineti rwa irembo kugirango uvugurure cyangwa usimbuze, kimwe no kugenzura agaciro kayo no gukurikirana uko ubusabe bwawe bugeze mu rwanda.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusaba uruhushya rwo gutwara moto ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RTRA (Ikigo gishinzwe Gutwara no Kuhagararira).
Answer_google-translate: Niba ufite uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga mu Rwanda, urashobora gukoresha serivisi ya Irembo kugirango uyivugurure kumurongo utiriwe usura ibiro byabiherewe uburenganzira. Sura gusa urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa kugirango utangire inzira yo kuvugurura kandi ukurikize amabwiriza yatanzwe.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba uruhushya rwo gutwara moto unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba icyemezo gishyashya cy’ubutaka mu biro byacu cyangwa ukoreshe serivisi zacu kuri Irembo zifasha kuvugurura inyandiko.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ushobora gusaba uruhushya rwo gutwara moto ukoresheje Irembo. Uzakenera kwiyandikisha mu ishuri ryo gutwara ibinyabiziga, gutsinda ikizamini, no kwishyura amafaranga asabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> Land Services -> Subdivision -> Shyiramo ibisabwa byose
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Kugirango ugabanye ikibanza cyawe mubice bibiri bitandukanye kugirango wubake amazu, uzakenera gutanga icyifuzo kubiro bya leta bireba cyangwa ibiro byubuyobozi bwubutaka. Bazakuyobora muburyo bwo kugabana ubutaka no kubona ibyemezo bikenewe kumushinga wawe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka kugira ngo cyemeze ko umutungo wawe utagabanywa. Injira kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, ushake serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubutaka, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo gusaba, harimo no gutanga inyandiko zisabwa.
Answer_google-translate: Urashobora gusaba serivisi zo kugabana ubutaka ukoresheje urubuga rwa interineti rwa Irembo. Kora konti gusa, wuzuze impapuro zikenewe, hanyuma utange ibyifuzo byawe kugirango ubyemeze. Iyi nzira izagufasha kugabana byemewe nubutaka bwawe muri Rusororo kubyo ugamije.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo cyo kugabanya ikibanza unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Saba amakuru y'aho icyangombwa kiri anyuze mu murongo w'ubufasha kuri Irembo, maze usuzume uko byagenze mu buryo bw'umwuga.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Kugira ngo ugabanye ikibanza, uzakenera gusaba uruhushya rwo kugabanya ubutaka. Uzakenera ibyangombwa by'ubutaka, igenamigambi ry'ahazubakwa, no kwishyura amafaranga asabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> Education -> Permit Application -> Shyiramo ibisabwa byose
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Urakoze kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye! Urashobora gukoresha serivisi za irembo kugirango usabe gahunda zuburezi bwo hejuru, usabe inyandiko zamasomo, cyangwa ubone ubundi buryo bwuburezi kugirango ukomeze urugendo rwawe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusaba perimi ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa RTRA (Ikigo gishinzwe Gutwara no Kuhagararira).
Answer_google-translate: Twishimiye kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye! Niba ushaka guteza imbere amashuri yawe, urashobora gukoresha serivisi za Irembo kugirango usabe kwinjira muri kaminuza cyangwa ugere kubindi bikoresho byuburezi mu Rwanda.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba uruhushya rwo gutwara imodoka unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba icyemezo gishyashya cy’ubutaka mu biro byacu cyangwa ukoreshe serivisi zacu kuri Irembo zifasha kuvugurura inyandiko.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Kugira ngo ubone perimi, ugomba kuba ufite nibura imyaka 18, kwiyandikisha mu ishuri ryo gutwara ibinyabiziga, gutsinda ibizamini byombi (inyandiko n'ibikorwa), no kwishyura amafaranga asabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Ibyemezo bisabwa mu gihe cyo gukora mutation, gushyingira, cyangwa gukemura ibibazo by'ubutaka. Reba kuri Irembo -> Legal Certificates
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Icyemezo cy'imyitwarire myiza, cyemeza ko utari muri gereza, ubusanzwe kigira agaciro k'umwaka umwe mu rwanda. Kugirango ubone icyemezo gishya, urashobora kubisaba kumurongo ukoresheje urubuga rwa irembo cyangwa ugasura sitasiyo ya polisi iri hafi kugirango igufashe.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Icyemezo cy'uko tutafunzwe gishobora kuba gikenewe n'inzego zimwe na zimwe (nka kazi, ubwishingizi, n'ibindi) kugira ngo zemeze ko umuntu akiriho, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n'imicungire y'umutungo cyangwa ubwiteganyirize. Igihe cyo kwishyura icyemezo gishobora gutandukana bitewe n'inzego zikwegereye. Ushobora gukurikirana aho ubusabe bwawe bugeze kuri konti yawe ya Irembo cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo ngo umenye aho bigeze.
Answer_google-translate: Mu Rwanda, icyemezo cy'inshinjabyaha cyakuwe mu biro by'ubushinjacyaha gifite agaciro mu gihe cy'amezi atandatu. Kugira ngo ubone icyemezo gishya, urashobora gusaba imwe ukoresheje serivisi za Irembo kumurongo cyangwa gusura ubushinjacyaha imbonankubone kugirango inyandiko ivuguruye.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba icyemezo gishya cy'uko tutafunzwe unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Tegereza gato cyangwa uhamagare serivisi zacu kugira ngo utange ikibazo cyawe ku bijyanye no kwishyura neza.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Icyemezo cy'uko umuntu atafunzwe kimara amezi 6 gusa. Ushobora gusaba icyemezo gishya ukoresheje Irembo. Injira ku rubuga rwacu, uhitemo iyo serivisi, wuzuze amakuru asabwa, wishyure amafaranga asabwa.

Answer_deepseek-r1: Kanda kuri Irembo -> ID Services -> Document Tracking -> Shyiramo numero y'irangamimerere -> Reba progress
Answer_digital-umuganda-mt: Mbabarira kubyerekeye ikibazo cyawe. Kugirango ubone ibyemezo byinyongera, uzakenera kumenyekanisha ubujura kuri polisi hanyuma usabe gusimburwa ku biro bya leta bireba, nk'ubuyobozi bukuru bw'abinjira n'abasohoka mu rwanda. Menya neza gutanga ibyangombwa byose bikenewe kandi ukurikize inzira zisabwa.
Answer_gemini-pro2.5: Ushobora gusanga ibyangombwa byawe byose kuri konti yawe ya Irembo, cyangwa ukahamagara umurongo w'ubufasha wa Irembo kugira ngo bakurikirane ikibazo cyawe.
Answer_google-translate: Mbabajwe no kumva ubujura bwinyandiko zawe. Kugirango ubone abasimbuza uruhushya rwo gutwara no kwerekana indangamuntu, ugomba kumenyesha abapolisi ubujura hanyuma ugasura inzego zibishinzwe nka polisi ishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga ndetse n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe kumenyekanisha indangamuntu kugirango usabe abasimbuye.
Answer_gpt-4o: Ushobora gusaba ibyangombwa bishya unyuze kuri serivisi za Irembo cyangwa ukagana ibiro by'ubutaka.
Answer_gpt-o3-mini: Nyamuneka saba icyemezo gishyashya cy’ubutaka mu biro byacu cyangwa ukoreshe serivisi zacu kuri Irembo zifasha kuvugurura inyandiko.
Answer_sonnet-3.7: Ugomba kubanza gutanga raporo y'ubujura muri polisi. Nyuma ushobora gusaba ibyangombwa bishya ukoresheje Irembo. Uzakenera kwerekana kopi ya raporo y'ubujura n'inyemezabwishyu y'amafaranga asabwa.
